name: Crash Driver TM
description:
Crash Driver is a fast paced racing game. You never dare drive so fast in the real world! Control your car with incredible fast speed during traffic rush time! Also enjoy beautiful view during the journey - desert, forest, sea and city!

Intuitive game rules:
- Tilt phone to control car direction
- Tap to accelerate

Tips to win high score:
- Keep accelerating car so that the score will be boosted.
- Watch out indicator light. Vehicles may turn left or right.

Enjoy feeling super speedy Crash Driver! Please give us your feedback, rate or comment if you like this game!
